#summary of system parameters

= System Parameters =

|| *property* || *type* || *default* || *description* ||
|| "priter.job" || boolean || true || turn on priter framework, otherwise it does normal MapReduce job ||
|| "mapred.jobtracker.taskScheduler" || string || org.apache.hadoop.mapred.PrIterTaskScheduler || use PrIter's task scheduler for assign MRPairs||
|| "priter.checkpoint" || boolean || true || turn on checkpoint for the support of fault tolerance and load balancing||
|| "priter.checkpoint.frequency" || int || 5 || the StateTable checkpoint dump frequency for fault tolerance and load balancing ||


|| "mapred.iterative.lbtimethresh" || long || 20000 || the time difference (ms) threshold to the average for performing load balancing ||
|| "mapred.iterative.rollback.frequency" || long || 2000 || the frequency for a task to check if should do roll back ||



|| "priter.job.priority" || boolean || true || turn on prioritized iteration, otherwise it performs normal iteration on top of PrIter ||
|| "priter.job.inmem" || boolean || true || in-memory PrIter system, no need to sort, otherwise on-disk PrIter, need to sort||



|| "mapred.iterative.topk" || integer || 1000 || specify the number of interested top records ||
|| "mapred.iterative.topk.scale" || integer || 4 || how many top records to be sent to the merge worker. scale to the average. ||
|| "mapred.iterative.snapshot.interval" || integer || 10000 || the time interval of snapshot generation ||
